Row.Text: +5 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Adjacency for Quarters and Wonders. Great Britain Unique Gold Building. Ageless.
Great Britain Unique Gold Building. Ageless.

+5 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. +1 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production Adjacency for Resources and Wonders. +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Adjacency for Navigable Rivers. Great Britain Unique Production Building. Ageless.
Great Britain Unique Production Building. Ageless.

Great Britain Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Manufactory and Royal Exchange in the same District. +2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science for every connected Settlement.
+2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science for every connected Settlement.
+4[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. Receive a second Naval Unit each time you train a Naval Unit (But not Purchase). Ageless. Must be placed on land adjacent to Coast.
Receive a second Naval Unit each time you train a Naval Unit. Ageless. Must be placed on land adjacent to Coast.
You asked me once if I remembered Battersea. And now I do.
